title: Welcome to My App!
description: This is a description of my app in English.
pendingDetails: You can review your review history or set up notifications to stay informed of new reviews.
labelTest: How do I perform this test?
howTest: How do I perform this test?

register.notePassword: Create and confirm your password to activate your user
register.norm: Minimum 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 number and 1 symbol
register.notActive: This is not your evaluation, please consult your evaluator

discp.steps1: Do not think too much about the answers, it should take no more than 15 minutes in total
discp.steps2: There are no right or wrong answers, try to be as honest as possible
discp.steps3: When answering, think about what you are like only in the environment in which you are being evaluated (professional, personal or social), do not mix them
discp.steps4: Order by dragging the 4 words, with the highest being the one that describes you the most and the lowest being the one that describes you the least, even if you do not feel 100% identified
discp.read: I have read and understood how to perform the evaluation
